title: Just Don't Do ANYTHING STUPID
body_text:
DODGEBALL 128:
Avakian vs. Smalls
One can laugh - almost.
Fearlessly reckless. Wildly insane. 100% unpredictable. Come the 1st of March, honored captains. Just a few choice phrases to paint this 128th picture.
Rob Avakian
, the legend himself competing since the sport's inception, has not just happily accepted this encounter, but rather surprisingly
requested
it in the first place! "Eddie Gordo"
Smalls
has been out of the captain's spotlight for a multiple number of months, so why would he turn back the challenge!
Regardless of how DODGEBALL 128 came about,
The Road to C30
just got a hell of a lot sweeter with this show-stealing war set to take place. Catch this never-before-witnessed showdown live, March 1, only at Wall High School.
body_html:
DODGEBALL 128: Avakian vs. Smalls
One can laugh - almost.

Fearlessly reckless. Wildly insane. 100% unpredictable. Come the 1st of March, honored captains. Just a few choice phrases to paint this 128th picture. Rob Avakian, the legend himself competing since the sport's inception, has not just happily accepted this encounter, but rather surprisingly requested it in the first place! "Eddie Gordo" Smalls has been out of the captain's spotlight for a multiple number of months, so why would he turn back the challenge!

Regardless of how DODGEBALL 128 came about, The Road to C30 just got a hell of a lot sweeter with this show-stealing war set to take place. Catch this never-before-witnessed showdown live, March 1, only at Wall High School.
